name: artist-fan-site
description: A frontend fan site for the artist Moderat, created to learn UIKit, JS, and jQuery.

scripts.copy-vendor: copyfiles -f node_modules/uikit/dist/css/uikit.min.css src/css/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/uikit/dist/js/uikit.min.js src/js/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/uikit/dist/js/uikit-icons.min.js src/js/
